name: Jimmy Cash
dialogue: Congrats Mrs Gatberg on winning the mayoral election!
My name is Jimmy, and I'll be your financial adviser
There's little you can build and execute without cash these days
It is my job to help you grow this town into a thriving economy!

name: Allena
dialogue: Hey there, I'm the people's representative at the Ministry for the Environment
If there is rampant development and the environment is harmed it could also cripple the town
I'm here to make sure our environment is protected and our town is safe from natural disasters.

name: James the Dog
dialogue: Woof! [My name is James, miraculously you can understand me ¯\_(ツ)_/¯]
Woof! Woof! [Decisions you make will also impact citizens' happiness]
Woof! Woof! [If they are very unhappy, you could be voted out of office]
